long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
There are errors when you start the game Dota2.

Error]: TSC 726298271e84 Message from syslogd@fedora at Apr 2 10:35:08 ... kernel:mce: [Hardware Error]: PROCESSOR 0:306a9 TIME 1491118508 SOCKET 0 APIC 2 microcode 1c
These errors started after updating the kernel 4.10 and this errors are not reportable by standart tools in Linux.
This is my first report please don`t be so angry to me.
The MCE messages always there, 4.10 had an issue where those were logged to console instead of mcelog. This should be fixed with the current kernel.
